survey_response.review_text:
I have been in touch with Dr for almost 3 years. I don't have words to describe him. He is so calm and so peaceful. You start feeling better after meeting him.

Fortis, Shalimar Bagh, and Max Hospital, Shalimar Bagh hospital is just a 5-minute drive from my home. But I still travel for 1 and a half hr just to meet him. 

My mother's BP was touching 200/100. And she is so sensitive that a lot of BP medicines didn't suit her. Some medicines would cause swelling, some would cause a sensation of nausea or dryness in the mouth. My family Dr, whom I have been in touch with last 30 years got irritated. But, Dr Amit never lost patience. I He kept trying new medicines, and finally, her BP was controlled. 

God bless you, Dr Amit.

I have no words to thank Dr Amit Mittal. He gave my father a new lease of life.

My father was diagnosed with mitral valve regurgitation in 2023. A hospital can be a daunting place for anybody, especially for someone in their 70s'. But thanks to Dr Mittal, Dr. Das and their excellent team, my dad was treated with utmost care and efficiency.  He was prescient with his diagnosis, excellent in his treatment and generous with giving us his time during those stressful days of hospitalization. The open-heart surgery and valve replacement went smoothly at Apollo and the post-operative care under his guidance was top notch. 

Even though my parents live in another part of the country, Dr Mittal is always responsive, reachable, just a call away, sparing his valuable time to still glance at test reports or take an occasional video call to give us his medical advice without charging a penny. 

I have nothing but gratitude and respect for his expertise, his humility and the empathy with which he treats his patients. He has my father's blessings.
***** ********** honest, respectful, highly supportive... very trustful.. great team, was proactive given multiple advices.. thank you very much

We went for our mother's heart issue, she was suffering from angina and we were seeing some other doctor in Apollo. However, we were not happy with him. We went to escorts and then to medantta for second opinion. Somehow, someone introduced us to Dr. Amit Mittal in Apollo only and he was like an angel to us. Except for him everyone has suggested bypass, but he understood us and our inhibitions and suggested angioplasty. He made us understand the procedure and we got relief after just meeting with Dr. Amit. Dr. Amit did the angioplasty the very next day and everything went well. It's been 2 years now. My mother is doing well and with god's grace and with Dr. Amit's experience, I am sure she will continue to be healthy.
Thanks a ton from our whole family.

I can simply say that I was under tremendous pressure due the cardiac problem of my father. I have visited few doctors already but satisfaction was a missing part. 
Yesterday I consulted with Dr Amit and what a magical pleasure feeling and realxing breathe we all can have . He listens patiently and the way he explains all about your problem is amazing. What I found most about him that he is a true doctor with no thoughts of trapping patient unnecessarily. I am fortunate that I could get his consultation on time before it is too late. Many thanks!

Dr Amit is great human being and helped me thru out. I have got my mother's check up done, she has Atrial Fibration. He is thourogh in his approach and does  not push for unnecessary treatments. His diagnosis  and recommended medicine is perfect.
Afterather got operated from Chandigarh and we were worried , I called Dr Amit for Help and he has always helped me and provided general guidelines, always picked up my phone , late at night also. Always provided general guidelines and it was much needed help, he is like godsend.thanks doctor.

Doctor Amit Mittal treated my father-in-law and I felt he is one of the genuine, honest, and decent doctors with such vast experience and his humbleness towards patients is noticeable.  His team works for the family and understands the situation. I would say in an emergency unknowingly we met a gem of a person with a strong hold on his work. Respect for such doctors and their team including Sachin in Apollo Hospital.

review_reply.reply_text:
This patient visited my clinic on 1.6.21. Received proper consultation and medical prescription.  On 5.6.21 i received a call from patient mentioning that she is much better and there is slight pain in left arm, for which i mentioned to watsapp me the prescription and her issues ( i have call recording of that). Within 5min i got another call from her daughter regarding same issues, as iam busy with some of my personal problem so i ask her that just now received a call from your mother and pls dont call again and again . To this she start threatening me that i cant talk like this so i cut the call saying i cant help you ( i have the call recording). After 10min i myself called her daughter saying that look doctor do have there families and there personal problem so try to understand for which she says that she will put a bad review about me on public forum and no patient will visit me. I again replied that i have my patient base and didnt need her recommendation. I also asked her that if her mother wants to talk to me she call me just to end the conversation(i have call recording of that)

This feedback is totally one sided story as a Doctors do have there families and problem but patients like these wants a doctor to be available everytime they call and if doctor dont respond at that time they will threaten the doctor. With this type of behaviour of yours you will never receive a good consultation as you yourself have mentioned in clinic to have changes many doctors.

survey_response.review_text: Sorry to say but Dr. Amit Mittal *** * *** ******** *** rude doctor. * **** ***** *********** **** **** ******** *** ****** **** *** ****** ** ****I visited him for my mother's treatment for the first time after reading the reviews from Practo. He gave proper medicines and consultation but due to some problem which she wanted to discuss, she called him.Firstly he did not picked the phone nor called back ***** ***** *** ************ ** ** ******* *** ********* When he finally picked the phone he asked my mother to whatsapp him of the problem. She lives alone and does not very well understand the technology. She told me so I called on the same number and as soon as he picked he started yelling. He did not even ask if I am the patient or a kin of the patient. What would it be if instead of me it was my mother on the other side of the phone. She is a heart patient and this is how he treats his patient.**** ** *** ******** ***** **** * ****** ** * ****** ***** ***** *********** ** ******* ******* ** ** ** ** *** **** ****** ** *** **** ***** he kept the phone back without listening to the problem and said that yes this is my way of responding to my patients.A big no to him ever in my life. Please don't visit him ** *** ******* ** ********** **** ** **** **** ** ****** *** **** ** ** ** ** ********* *** *** *******  ** ***** **** **** ***This is my story from our visit to his clinic V care heart centre in Indirapuram Ghaziabad.

I booked the appointment for my didi. I don’t stay in NCR anymore and she went to numerous doctors and nobody even explain her ehat’s wrong with her heart. But Dr. Amit not any explained the issue but shared all the available treatment options. He has earn my respect and my sister is really really happy. Thank you so much everyone.

Dr Mittal is very humble doctor who listened the problem of my wife very patiently.** *** ***** ******** * **** *** * **** **** ****** *** **** **** ******* ****** ****** *** ******* ** ******* *** ******** ** **** ******I am submitting my comments just after my first visit and shall like to offer my views after 7-10 days when we see the response of treatment.However I  recommend  him  ** * **** **** ************

review_reply.reply_text: Thanks Sanket for such wonderful words

survey_response.review_text: Amit is a great doctor, friendly and measured in his approach. he knows his field and takes his treatment just to the right extent, doesn't push it unnecessarily. Its good to have him around knowing that for quality cardiac consult you don't have to rush to delhi every time.

Very nice human being. So, patiently doctor educates the patient. Patient education is commendable and the way he explains the disease/condition and it's treatment is very much absorbable by the patient. Visited him for my father's diagnosed SVT (Supraventricular Tachycardia). He read the reports and explained the disease/condition and then very patiently explained the possible treatments. Highly recommended him.

I had consulted many top shot cardiologists for my grandmother who was suffering from ectopic beats. None of them could help. Then I came across Dr. Mittal. He patiently heard the long medical history of my grandmother, checked all the reports and then suggested medicines.The medicines have started to show results. Thanks doctor.

contexts.text: Pain in Left part of Chest

survey_response.review_text: I was having pain in chest so visited the doctor to see if it’s related to any heart issue . Doctor dealt it in extremely satisfying manner - he explained all the problems in details helped in ruling out that it was not related to heart .... Much relieved.

contexts.text: Pain in Left part of Chest

survey_response.review_text: Doctor was very polite and explained every point in  detail . Every question asked was answered with explanation. The clinic was very clean and well sanitized. All of the investigations like ECG, Echo and other related to heart can be done within clinic.

contexts.text: Pain in Left part of Chest

survey_response.review_text: i used to get stabbing/pricking pain in my left part of chest sometimes,i was worried so went on for ecg ,echo and tmt by myself.There were certain parameters which were not in the normal range so by looking at his feedbacks on practo,i decided to consult him.i must say the experience was amazing,he is very professional, insightful and informed doctor.Thankyou as such i feel very much releived after the consultation.

I was worried about my heart condition as feeling some uneasiness for last few weeks,  I met the doctor and experience was fantastic.He listened my entire medical history with patience and assured me not to worry.in fact i insist him for ecg and echo and his answer was "its not required..still you want, its your money,your decision, go ahead."Overall fantastic experience. Thanks Doctor!!

He is actually a gem of cardiology and consultation advise. Very polite and humble, listens to the patient's problem carfully and in detail, diagnosed with proper care and correct observation by detection the wrong reports produced by our end, great knowledge and experience in his arena.I would really recommend everyone to visit him, m sure anyone will not going to b dissapointed. Sir, your advise has really helped me for the treatment of my father. I m really thankful to you ever and again. Worth for the advise, medication, cunsulation and every penny charged by him

I visisted for my fathers regular angina due to which he was unable to walk even for 5 minutes and had to take 1 to 3 sorbitrate but now he goes to morning walk without any angina poblems. Thanks to him.
Dr Amit Mittal is very humble and kind, the diagnosis was also very up to the mark , I strongly recommend him for consultation
Good experience with doctor he explained everything and also explain its remedy in a very clear manner will recommend everyone

I am the existing patient of Dr Amit Mittal. he is very supportive and kind person. he treats me just like a family member not as a patient. he is done me surgery of arota vain at appolo hospital delhi. at the time of admission in the hospital everytime he helps us many time for everything. I am very thankful to him.

review_reply.reply_text: Thanks Ma'am,  your words inspire us to do even better.

Suttle and calm doctor, understood the concdition 
It's my first visit for my mother, she was also very happy to meet him
Very nice doctor. Listened cardfully to my issue and suggested proper medication for followup surgery for PAC procedure
Humble and Grounded. Very nice doctor. Would recommend him for Cardiac related issues and even other issues. He listens patiently and gives ample time.

Amazing person and a doctor. Listened to my issue carefully and advised. No unnessary test or medicine recommended. Since I was there for general check up, a normal ECG was performed and everything was right

*** **** ******  ** ****A VERY FRINDLY AND HUMBLE DOCTOR,LISTEN TO PETIENT  CAREFULLY.
PERTINENT  FEEL COMFORTABLE WITH HIS BEHAVIOUR. I AM FULLY SATISFIED  AND RECOMMENDED 100/100.ANY CARDIO  PROBLEM MUST CONTECT HIM.GOD BLESS DR AMIT.

Doctor is really polite and try to understand your concerns before providing solution, he is one of the best doctor I have met in recent past.

Surely recommend to some one who is looking for a cardiologist.
Dr. Mittal is a very nice doctor and very well behaved,  ****** ************* *** explain every question with details. I recommend to all for this Dr.
**** ************* ******* ********** * proper diagnosis, good explanation , quick turnaround, overall very satisfied
Very friendly *** ************* doctor. With experience he explained well in right manner and highly recommended.

*** ** *** ****** ******* * **** **** He will listen to you patiently, do the checkup and then give you advice and medication.  I felt very happy and satisfied after consultation. Keep up the great work Dr. Mittal.
Doctor was very calm, listened to all the problems very patiently, explained medicines and doses *** *** *** ***** *** *********** ****** Would very highly recommend.
a really nice cardiologist..gives complete time to each and every patient.. we were skeptical about the low pulse rate but he guided us very well..** *********** ****** *********
very nice. very competent and experienced doctor. was cordial, friendly, and the clinic experience was very nice too.

I was suffering from chronic hypertension. ****** * **** ********* *********** ********* No unnecessary test performed.Diagnosis was accurate and got relief in first visit only. will highly recommend the doctor. Thank you so much sir.
This was the first visit to Dr. And it was nice experience for waiting time and explation for the causes, I have to start treatment. And will update further accordingly.

Great Doctor. Visited for chest pain. Talks to patient in a very friendly manner and does not creates fearsome environment. 
Explains the entire situation to the patient. 
Felt very good after meeting him and really relaxed. 

Thanks Doctor.

He is wonderful doctor **** ***** ******* ********** I went for my mother heart related issue. His advise and medicines helped my mother to recover fast. He is very cooperative and understanding person.

My father was feeling energy less, tired and had bp issues. Doctor listened to us, patiently saw all the precious tests and prescription and finally gave satisfactory explanation about the cause of problem
It was overall a good experience meeting with Dr. Amit mittal. He has listen all my problem related to my body and then shared their valuable advice. I am completely satisfied with his treatment.
* ********* ** **** ****** *** *** ********** he is polite and give you proper hearing before advising for treatment. Don't think twice to approach him if you have any symptoms of cardiac issue.

Very nice doctor and he had explained the issue related to problems.  He is also very co-operative .

I recommend for best treatment.

DD Sharma, Vasundhara, Ghaziabad
He is an experienced consultant, good doctor. I was very comfortable while discussing issues with him.

survey_response.review_text: The Doctor is very polite and patient. Listens the problem very carefully. The explanations are very brief.
The experience was very soothing to visit Dr Amit Mittal. He is having vast experience of treating various ailments of cardiac. No white coat syndrome develops in the patient.
Highly recommended doctor. Really patient doctor, hears all the problems and then suggests the best possible solution.

review_reply.reply_text: Thanks Dr Dhananjoy Gupta for such encouraging words.

survey_response.review_text: Highly experienced, ************* and qualified doctor with very gentle and patient friendly attitude. Would recommend him for heart and cardiac consultation and therapy.

explanation about the diseases in common or layman language and listen the problem carefully is the best part. you cannot find easily any doctor who is already working in a top most hospital in Delhi with this quality. highly recommend . thank you sir.

The doctor was very polite and listened to my issues patiently. He suggested some tests accordingly and gave the appropriate diagnosis which i was satisfied with. Did not charge me for an ecg which was nice of him. I would surely visit again if needed.

I hv visited first time here for my wife blood pressure heavy ffluctuations problems. Doctor and staff are very polite and friendly and briefing was very satisfactory. Echo also done in very less time report also satisfactory. Over all I recommended  for any BP and heart related followup if needed.... lets see more positive further....

review_reply.reply_text: Really Sorry if you feel unsatified. You are most welcome for another consultation without any fee. Feel free to call me whenever you want to visit.

survey_response.review_text:
Kept waiting for 1hr, spend 5 mins Max with me, as there were other patients waiting. 

After his consultation I have to refer another doc to get desired consultation, no value for money; in fact I checked my BP at the cost of consultation. I won't recommend him.

I went to Dr. Mittal as my ecg findings were not good enough. I was dealt with patience. I got my ecco and tmt test done and was given a clean chit by doctor. He is such a decent doctor and i strongly recommend him. I can assure that Dr.Mittal assures  tests that r not req. shud not be done.
Awesome Behaviour of staffs and fantastic Treatment facilities *** ****** ****** ** *** **** ******
Doctor experience is very good.  I am satisfied with doctor talk Doctor says your heart is very good
Very good experience with sir as he explain everything about issue and it's remedy so will recommend everyone

review_reply.reply_text: Patient visited me with a ECG having long sinus pauses , i listened to his whole problem as he is here for another opinion. Even got a repeat ECG done. If Pauses are more then 2.5 - 3sec then its a guidelines based indication for pacemaker implantation.  However most of the patient wants to avoid invasive treatment thats why whole blame was put on doctor s. As far as explanation of the problem is concerned, i explained his son making the diagram of whole heart conduction system, still its they want to blame the doctor its upto them.

survey_response.review_text: He did not explain the problem and just asked us to get pacemaker installed **** ****** ** *** *** ********* Had it been in his hand he would have implanted the pacemaker on the chair. Please don't visit him.
Doctor behavior and treatment was very good. I also tell my experience to my friends and relationship

The doctor suggests suitability of tests and treatment and does not make us go through worrisome tests and diagnostic procedures. He had treated my mother earlier and we could reach quite a quick conclusion on her problem.

Very good experience. Listens to the problem patiently and answered the queries very calmly. This was my 3rd or 4th visit. Immediately identified the treatment after looking at symptoms. I have not faced any issues in last 1 year.

Dr Amit is very generous person ,listens to the patient's problem very carefully , guide and treat accordingly.

Me and my father both are happy and satisfied to meet with him. 0 minutes wait time, infact we were attended 10 minutes before the time fixed for appointment. explained everything in detail without haste. We are happy clients.
The doctor listens to problem very well and answer all queries with patience. He believes in less medications and tries to resolve the issue naturally which makes him outstanding.
